events.title: 🕶️Blind Coding💻
events.description: 🕶️ Code Without Sight. Debug with Might! 💻⚡
events.details:
🕹️ Event Stages:
📝 Blind Coding Challenge:
- One participant types with their screen off.
- The other guides them via voice call.
- Accuracy and teamwork are key!
🛠️ Debugging Duel:
- Fix the code from Round 1 with 20-second switch turns.
- No explanations, just quick debugging!
- Fewer switches = higher points!

events.title: 🎨Pitch Point🎨
events.details:
🕹️ Event Round:
🎯 Design a digital poster based on your chosen theme, showcasing your creativity and innovation

events.title: 🎨UI/UX Showdown🚀
events.details:
🕹️ Event Rounds:
🎨 Webpage Design Challenge
- Create a visually appealing, user-friendly webpage using Figma.
- Design will be judged on creativity, usability, and overall UI/UX appeal.

events.title: 💡Tech Debate 🗣️🤖
events.description: ⚡️ Speak Bold. Think Sharp. Conquer the Debate! 🎤🏆
events.details:
🎙️ Event Rounds:
💬 Structured Debate – Present arguments and counter the opposition.
🤔 Audience Q&A – Answer on-the-spot questions with confidence.

events.title: 🎭🏆 Squid Game 🏆🎭
events.details:
💀 Game Rounds:
🦶 The Glass Bridge – Step carefully! One wrong move… and you’re out! 🩸
🔴 Red Light, Green Light 🟢 – Answer quickly and correctly to advance, but be careful… stop at the right moment or face elimination! 🚦
🎲 Marble Game – A battle of wits where logic, luck, and strategy determine who keeps their marbles and who loses it all! 🎭
🎼 Game of Music – Memorize the beats, search for the missing phrase, and complete the lyrics flawlessly to survive the final challenge! 🎵

events.title: 📢 VPP Got Talent – Intercollege Competition 🎭
events.description: Are you ready to showcase your talent & impress the judges?
events.details:
*Registeration fee is refundable if not shortlisted 

🔹 Marking Criteria:
🎭 Personality – Stage presence & confidence
🎤 Presentation – Clarity & engagement
💡 Uniqueness – Creativity & originality
🔥 Confidence – Own the stage like a PRO!

events.title: 🎮BGMI Arena⚔️
events.details:
🎯 Match Format & Maps: (Points System will be used)
🟢 R1-Qualifiers: Erangle (Top 25 teams qualify!)
🟡 R2-Semifinals: Map chosen via this form (No elimination)
🔴 R3-Finals: Erangle (Points decided by Point System)

events.title: 🚀 Business Mania 🔎💻
events.description: 💡 Think Big. Pitch Bold. Win the Market! 🏆💼
events.details:
📊 Event Rounds:
🌐 Online Screening 📝
- Submit your business idea via Google Form.
- Originality & pitch quality will decide who advances.
- Only the top 10 teams qualify for the final round!
🎤 The Final Showdown 💰
- Each team gets 3 minutes to pitch their idea.
- Buyers have 3 coins each to invest.
- Teams can earn 1, 2, or all 3 coins per buyer.
- The team with the most coins wins! 🏆

events.title: 🚀 Tech-Hunt Event 🔎💻
events.description: ⚡ Think Fast. Code Smart. Hunt the Treasure! 🏆💻
events.details:
🕹️ Event Rounds:
🔐 Solve a Riddle – Crack a tricky riddle to unlock your system!
🐍 Python Challenge – Complete the missing code with accuracy.
💻 C++ Debugging – Fix errors and find the hidden IP address!
📜 Java Execution – Run the correct command to reveal the final clue.
🏆 The Treasure Hunt – Follow the clues, think fast, and claim victory!

events.title: 🧠Mastermind Arena🎯
events.details:
🕹️ Event Rounds:
❌ Tic-Tac-Toe Knowledge Battle 🎲
- Answer questions to earn a move on the Tic-Tac-Toe board.
- The first team to complete a row, column, or diagonal wins and advances!

💻 Hacker’s Ladder 🐍🎲
- Move forward by rolling a digital dice and solving coding challenges!
- Correct answers = points | Wrong answers = penalties
- Landing on a snake drops your points – stay sharp!
- The first two teams to reach 100+ points get bonus points for the final ranking!
